text: Believe in yourself.
author: Unknown

text: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
author: Helen Keller

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: If you’re always trying to be normal you will never know how amazing you can be.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Be water, my friend.
author: Bruce Lee

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
author: Aristotle

text: What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create.
author: Buddha

text: Don’t cry because it’s over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

text: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
author: Vincent Van Gogh

text: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln
